[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://bitcoindoubler.tech/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/bitcoin-doubler-support-cover-photo2.jpg” animation=”off” _builder_version=”3.0.64″][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_row parallax_method_1=”off” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_text text_orientation=”center” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

CONTACT OUR SUPPORT TEAM

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row parallax_method_1=”off” parallax_method_2=”off” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_text text_orientation=”justified” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

If you have any questions or issues you would like us to solve for you, please don’t hesitate to contact our support team by opening a ticket.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://bitcoindoubler.tech/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/support.png” animation=”off” align=”center” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text text_orientation=”justified” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

* reply times are usually around 12 hours (depends on the number of open tickets)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

    Open Ticket

    fields marked with * are required fields

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
